text: Jonas Bloch (born February 8, 1939) is a Brazilian actor. He is known for his television roles as villains. Bloch is of a Ukrainian-Jewish descent. He is the father of actress DÃ©bora Bloch. He is known for his roles in Avaete, Seed of Revenge (1985), Tropicaliente (1994), Mango Yellow (2002), and in A Lei e o Crime (2009). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian Jews Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Jewish actors Category:Actors from Belo Horizonte
title: Jonas Bloch
